special_notes: Full rules: Uses the number zero 0 on personalized plates to represent both a number zero 0 or a letter O. Thus, if someone is issued personalized plate 70 FORD, the personalized plate will show the number 0 like this: 70 F0RD. The letter O is not used. A letter O is shown by using the number 0.
